description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Life Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Life Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBeaconOfHo]{Beacon of Hope}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRevivify00]{Revivify}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuardianFa]{Guardian of Faith}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMassCureWo]{Mass Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRaiseDead0]{Raise Dead}
